texts.es: El señor Demetrio vive en una zona rural en la comunidad Conda Baja, es una persona humilde, nació en la provincia de Carrasco y desde muy joven se dedica a trabajar, cuenta con escasos recursos económicos y tiene bajo su dependencia  a sus tres hijos que están estudiando, vive con su esposa y trabaja en su actividad agrícola y pecuaria como actividad primaria, para realizar su trabajo en el campo tiene que contratar a sus vecinos como personal eventual para la siembra y cosecha de sus productos agrícolas, su vivienda es rustica de adobe,  en su actividad agrícola y pecuaria trabaja de forma tradicional utilizando sus propias yuntas, actualmente solicita un crédito para la compra de abono orgánico llamado gallinaza y semilla de papa, de esta forma lograra aumentar sus ingresos y así podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, ofreciéndoles mayor bienestar.
texts.en:
Demetrio is a very humble person and lives in a rural area of the Conda Baja community. He was born in Carrasco province, and began working at a very young age. He has limited financial resources and supports his three children who are in school. He lives with his wife and works primarily in farming. To carry out his farm work, he contracts his neighbors as seasonal workers for the planting and harvesting of his crops. Demetrio lives in a very basic adobe house. He farms using traditional methods, using his own yokes.

Demetrio is currently requesting this loan to purchase organic manure called "Gallinaza" as well as potato seeds. This will allow him to increase his income and thus improve his family's quality of life and well-being.

loans.use: to buy organic manure ("Gallinaza") and potato seeds.

loans.name: George

texts.en: George used the previous loan to buy maize and beans to sell. He has four children aged between 16 and 5 years and only three attend school. He has been dealing in alcohol production to educate his children as a loving father. He also earns from produce and owns a maize milling machine to get additional income. He hopes to expand his business though he is challenged by competition and price fluctuations. William is requesting a loan to buy more liquor to sell.

loans.use: to buy more liquor  to sell.

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew is a married man. He has two children, ages 3 and 6 years old. He describes himself as determined. He operates a transport business, transporting customers using his bicycle. He also sells charcoal to earn extra income. He has been involved in his business for 3 years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are commuters. He describes his biggest business challenge as changes in weather and security.

Andrew will use this 50,000 Kenyan shilling loan to buy bicycle spare parts and more stock of charcoal to sell. He will use the anticipated profits to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy bicycle spare parts for his transport business and more stock of charcoal

loans.name: Kuña Pora Group

texts.es:
El grupo Kuña Pora está en su ciclo número 7º del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Forman también parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza donde por medio de capacitaciones todas van mejorando.
Una persona que se destaca por el empeño que pone por mejorar sus condiciones de vida es la Sra. Juana, quien tiene un pequeño y surtido copetín donde vende de todo, ya que sabe que así estará generando un mayor ingreso para su familia.
Ella pide este préstamo ya que quiere poder comprar golosinas, bebidas, yogurt y demás y así seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The Kuña Pora group is in their seventh loan cycle with the women's committee.  They all work and help each other to move forward.  They are also part of a poverty elimination program where everyone is improving with trainings.

Juana stands out for the effort she puts into improving her living conditions.  She has a small and well-stocked store where she sells everything, since she knows that is how she can generate more income for her family.  

She is requesting this loan to purchase snacks, drinks, yogurt, and other items to continue to be secure in her work.

loans.use: to purchase snacks, drinks, yogurt, and other items.

loans.name: Arnobia

texts.es:
Arnobia es una mujer de 46 años, dueña de un taller de confecciones con 18 años de experiencia en el sector y genera actualmente varios empleos a mujeres cabeza de familia. Está ubicada en un sector comercial de la ciudad y se ha caracterizado por su cumplimiento y calidad en la entrega de sus pedidos. Empleará el crédito en la compra de insumos (hilos, telas, botones, cierres) para las prendas que confecciona, lo que le permitirá aumentar su producción y lograr fidelizar su clientela prestando un mejor servicio con calidad y agilidad.
Arnobia sueña con hacer crecer su negocio y mejorar sus ingresos, además quiere generar más empleos y así contribuir con el desarrollo de la sociedad donde se desenvuelve.
texts.en: Arnobia is 46 year old woman who owns a clothes making shop with 18 years of experience in the sector and right now creates various jobs for female heads of family. It is located in a commercial section of the city, and it has been characterized by its fulfillment and quality in the delivery of their orders. She will use the loan to buy supplies (thread, fabric, buttons, zippers) for the garments she makes which will allow her to increase her production and foster customer loyalty providing better service with quality and agility. Arnobia dreams of growing her and improving her income. In addition, she wants to create more jobs and in that way contribute to the development of the society where it is unraveling.

loans.use: to buy supplies (thread,fabric, buttons, zippers) for the garments she makes.

loans.name: Bintou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce banc villageois a été créé le 15 mai 2008  jour de  son inauguration. Les femmes qui le composent sont très dynamiques de plus il existe une solidarité solide entre  les membres du groupe car habitant le même village. Les femmes pratiques le petit commerce.

Madame Bintou (debout à  droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe.  Elle est âgée de 44 ans, est mariée et mère de 06 enfants : 02 filles et 04 garçons. Elle est fait du maraichage, elle est aussi vendeuse d’huile de palme, de savon traditionnel. Une activité qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années. 

 
Avec ce prêt elle compte acheter de l’arachide pour la transformation et la vente.

Les bénéfices réalisés lui permettront d’apporter un soutien à  son mari dans la prise en charge des frais scolaires des enfants.
texts.en:
This banc villageois has been created on May 15, 2008. The group members are very  energetic,  and there is a  supportive spirit among them as they all come from the same village. They work as vendors.

Mrs. Bintou (the one standing on the right raising her hand) is the star borrower of the group. She is 44 years old, married and the mother of six: two daughters and four sons. She has a vegetable garden. She also sells palm oil and traditional soap. She has been working as a vendor for some years.
With this loan, she plans to buy peanuts for processing and resale.
The resulting revenues will allow her to help her husband cover the school expenses for their children.

loans.use: to buy peanuts for processing and resale.

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en:
Romeo is married and a father of two who works as a security guard in a private company, while his wife runs a general store for a living. She earns more from the business than his salary; his wife keeps on improving their business. 

His children were still studying, and he needs financial assistance to support them. 

He borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro finance to pay the education costs of his children. 

Romeo wants to improve the general living situation of his family, and hopes to see them successful in the future.

loans.use: to pay the education costs of his children

loans.name: Taase

texts.en:
Taase is a 25-year-old women with four children. She runs a small business selling muffins in her community, and she has been doing this for three years. 

Taase has requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, a bottle of vegetable oil, vanilla, a wooden spoon, a fry pan, plastic bags, yeast, and a gas stove to assist her in running the  business. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. 

Taase will use her earnings to assist her family's everyday needs, and also to improved her business.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, a bottle of vegetable oil, vanilla, a wooden spoon, a fry pan, plastic bags, yeast, and a gas stove.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is a Kiva borrower; he has one child. He describes himself to be sincere. 

He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located in a busy area, and his primary customers are commuters. He describes his biggest business challenge to be bad weather. 

He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy a stock of groceries to open a grocery store for his wife. 

This will enable them increase the family income. His business goal is to have an economically sustainable business within five years. 

He hopes that in the future, he will sustain his business. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a stock of groceries to open a grocery store for his wife

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is a 46-year-old single woman. She has two children who are 18 and 23 years old. She describes herself as devoted. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes and bags. She has been involved in this business for 15 years. Her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be operating through the low season. 

Leah will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes and bags. She hopes that in the future, she will succeed. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. Previous loan of KES 20,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes and bags

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy on sale a lot of the products that she sells (cosmetics, body cream, accessories, facial cream, perfume).

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 34-year-old married male with six children; five go to school. 

He has been in the clothing business for six years, plus he has a motorcycle transport business for additional income. 

Robert started the business to pay school fees for all his children, and is acquiring a loan to buy clothes to sell.

He hopes to construct a commercial house, although competition and high rental costs are challenges he faces.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Elmer

texts.en:
Elmer is married with one child. He operates a service-based business providing transportation in his community to make a living. His wife is responsible for taking care of their child and has some household chores. Having a new child is not easy, but with their determination to improve their lives, this couple never gets tired of working.

Elmer borrowed a loan from Gata Daku Multi-purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) to buy motor accessories. He plans to improve his business by having another motorcycle for rental and transportation services. In the future, Elmer want to improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to buy motor accessories for his motorcycle transport business

loans.name: Syuzanna

texts.en:
Syuazanna lives in Mets Sepasar village with her husband and two little children. She teaches at a local school and also is engaged in agriculture. 

Together with her husband, Syuzanna keeps cows and sheep. They also cultivate wheat and grass. Because she does not have enough land to cultivate more grass to feed the livestock, Syuzanna needs help. She asks for this loan of 3,000 USD to be able to purchase forage to feed the livestock. The loan will also help her to purchase fertilizer for land cultivation.
 
This loan is a big hope for Syuzanna and her husband. They want to be able to feed the livestock and continue running their agribusiness.

loans.use: to pay for forage for feeding the livestock and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farming supplies to ensure a good harvest

loans.name: Francisco Omar

texts.es:
Francisco es un joven muy trabajador de 25 años de edad, los escasos recursos no le permitieron terminar la escuela por lo que solo estudió hasta noveno grado, actualmente está soltero y vive con sus padres y hermana. 

La siembra de maíz, es la actividad en la cual ha trabajado Francisco desde hace 6 años, lo aprendió de su padre, pues él le enseñaba como realizar las labores del cultivo en época de siembra, hoy en día este joven cultiva dos hectáreas y también realiza trabajos de motorista ya que lo contratan para hacer viajes y él aprovecha pues son ingresos extras para su familia.

Él solicita este préstamo a CrediCampo, para comprar una motocicleta, ya que solo tiene una parte del dinero y necesita complementarlo con el préstamo, esto le ayudará mucho a Francisco, ya que cuando siembra tiene que viajar aproximadamente 30 metros en bicicleta y con la moto lo haría en menos tiempo, además le servirá para realizar mandados a la ciudad.

En un futuro, él desea formar una familia y por el momento seguir trabajando para ayudarles a su padres en los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Francisco is a very hardworking young man, age 25.  Limited resources didn’t allow him to finish school, so he only studied through the ninth grade.  Currently he is single and lives with his parents and sister.

For the past six years Francisco has worked sowing corn.  He learned this work from his father, because he taught him how to do farming work during planting season.  These days this young man grows two hectares and also works as a driver because people hire him to make trips.  He takes advantage of the opportunity for extra income for his family.

He is asking for this loan from CrediCampo to buy a motorcycle because he only has some of the money and needs to supplement it with a loan.  This will help Francisco a lot, because when he is planting he has to travel about 30 minutes by bicycle, and with a motorcycle he could do it in less time.  Also, it would help him when he is sent to the city.

In the future, he wants to have his own family.  For now, he wants to keep working to help his parents with the family expenses.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bananas and greens for retail sale.

loans.name: Maria Del Socorro

texts.es:
María del Socorro tiene 45 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijo en el distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como cerdos , patos y pekineses desde hace 02 años, en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 800 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecerlos a un mejor precio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
María del Socorro is 45 years old and lives with her husband and child in the District of Cayalti. This community is known for agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. It is located in Chiclayo Province, which part of the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

María del Socorro raises and sells small animals, such as pigs and ducks (especially the Pekin breed), in an area behind her home. She has been in this business for two years. María is requesting a loan of 800 PEN so that she can buy balanced feed for fattening her animals. This will allow her to obtain a better price from her customers.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals.

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es: Orlando inició el negocio de la fotografía y la marquetería, trabajando como ayudante, pero con el paso del tiempo adquirió mucha experiencia, con lo que hace unos años logró independizarse y sólo trabaja en esta actividad los fines de semana, ya que en semana se dedica a labores de agricultura. Su trabajo en la marquetería ha sido reconocido por su calidad y cumplimiento en las entregas. Orlando pretende invertir el crédito en la compra de materias primas para su trabajo en la marquetería, como marcos, papel fotográfico y tintas. Su sueño es tener un estudio fotográfico moderno en un local propio.
texts.en:
When Orlando started his photography and marquetry business, he was working as an assistant, but as time passed he acquired a lot of experience so managed to become an independent business owner a few years ago. He works at this job at weekends only. In the week he works on the land. Orlando's marquetry skills have been recognized for their quality and finish.

He wishes to use the loan money to buy supplies for his work such as frames, photography paper, and inks. His dream is to have a modern photography studio in premises that he owns.

loans.use: buy supplies  such as frames, photography paper, and inks

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, desde hace 28 años que se dedica a la venta de minutas su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el parque central cerca de su lugar de residencia tiene mucha clientela por ser un producto muy vendible con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Miguel esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de jaleas de sabores, hielo por mayor, miel, frutas, etc. y así seguir con su negocio para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Miguel is 47 years old and lives in his own home with his life companion. Since the age of 28, he has been selling flavored drinks from his business located at the central park near his home. He has many customers because his products are very easy to sell. With the revenue he generates from his sales, he is able to pay for some of his household expenses.

Miguel is requesting a loan in order to buy flavored gelatins, ice in bulk quantities, honey, fruit, and other supplies so that he can continue his business. This will enable him to provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy flavored gelatins, ice in bulk quantities, honey, fruit, and other supplies.

loans.name: Angie

texts.en:
Angie has been operating a piggery raising pigs for sale. For many years, Angie has been earning better income for her needs. Her previous loan, used for buying piglets and feeds, was successfully repaid with her effort and determination. She was able to buy more piglets from her revenue.

To improve the business, Angie took out a new loan from Gata Daku Multi-purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) to buy additional piglets. In the future, she wants to improve the business as well as her living situation.

loans.use: to buy piglets and livestock feed.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Aside from farming, Analiza engages in a hog-raising business to have an additional source of income. She and her husband aim to upgrade their status of living in order to give their children a better life. To achieve their goals, Analiza planned to improve her hog-raising business to generate sufficient income. 

Having inadequate capital, she is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy hog feed, vitamins and vaccines needed for her hogs. 

Through hard work and strong determination, she hopes that she will further improve the business.

loans.use: to buy hog feed, vitamins and vaccines needed for her hogs

loans.name: Flaviana

texts.es: La señora Flaviana es una persona trabajadora, tiene 47 años de edad, de estado civil viuda, alcanzo a estudiar solo hasta el nivel primario ya que su familia no tenía muchos recursos, vive en su propia casa que se encuentra situada en Tiraque. Su esposo murió hace 5 años en el trópico de Cochabamba, dejando en la orfandad 6 pequeños hijos que actualmente están bajo su dependencia, la actividad principal a la que se dedica es la agricultura, por año en promedio produce los siguientes productos agrícolas: 60 cargas de papa, 30 cargas de papa lisa y 80 arrobas de arveja (verde). La siembra de estos cultivos la realiza en sus propios terrenos en una superficie aproximada de dos a tres hectáreas que se encuentran ubicados en la misma localidad, los trabajos agrícolas los desarrolla con la colaboración de sus hijos, vecinos y de trabajadores eventuales, vive en una casa rustica de adobe. Actualmente solicita un crédito para comprar una parcela de terreno agrícola, para incrementar su producción y a corto plazo brindar mejores condiciones de vida a sus pequeños hijos.
texts.en:
Señora Flaviana is a hardworking person.  She is 47 years old and is widowed.  She managed to study only through elementary school because her family didn’t have many resources.  She lives in her own home, which is located in Tiraque.  Her husband died five years ago in the tropics of Cochabamba, leaving six young children orphaned.  Those children are currently under her care.  

Her primary job is in agriculture.  In one year, on average, she produces: 60 loads of potatoes, 30 loads of ulluco [a tuber similar to potatoes], and 80 arrobas [1 arroba = about 30 pounds] of green peas.  She sows these crops on her own land, which is about 2 to 3 hectares.  It is located in the same town.  She does the farm work with the help of her children, neighbors, and temporary laborers.  She lives in a rustic house made of adobe.  

Right now she is asking for a loan to buy a plot of farm land in order to increase her production and to provide her children with better living conditions within a short time.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farm land.

loans.name: Adelyn

texts.en:
Adelyn is 32 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

She runs a buy and sell charcoal in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Adelyn has borrowed and paid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell charcoal for four years, and also earns an income from fishing.

Adelyn aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Julio César

texts.es: Julio es un hombre trabajador dedicado desde hace 28 años a la venta de artesanías en un local en el centro de la ciudad, algunas de estas las fabrica él mismo, pues ha hecho cursos de marroquinería y calzado en una entidad gubernamental que presta los servicios de formación. Julio quiere invertir su crédito en la compra de materia prima para las artesanías (cuero y material para fabricar sandalias, billeteras, correas y demás artículos de cuero), y en otro surtido ya elaborado. Su sueño es tener un local más grande, desde el que pueda producir y vender en el mismo sitio, además de hacer crecer su negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Julio is a hardworking man who has sold crafts from his stall in the center of town for 28 years. Some of the crafts he makes himself because he has attended training courses in leatherwork and shoe making offered by a government organization. 

Julio wishes to use the loan money to buy supplies such as leather and other materials to make sandals, wallets, and belts as well as other items. His dream is to have larger premises where he can both make and sell the products. He also would like to grow his business and increase income.

loans.use: buy supplies such as leather and other materials to make sandals, wallets, and belts etc.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is asking for a loan to buy farm inputs such as sprays and fertilizer for the cabbage garden. 

He is a male, single, and age 29, living in Hoima, Uganda. He deals in cabbage and banana production, a business he started in 2009. 

John started business to earn a living, and be a major supplier of these two products. 

He sells to people in nearby areas, and hopes to have a self sustainable home, despite facing a challenge of heavy rains which sometimes destroy the crops.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as sprays and fertilizer for the cabbage garden.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna lives with her husband, parents-in-law and two little children (ages 6 and 4 years old). 

Anna's father-in-law is a teacher, working at a local village school and her husband is employed in the private sector.

But because with their salaries alone it is not possible to sustain the family's living, Anna and her mother-in-law run a farm. The farm is not big, and includes cows, sheep and chickens. Anna also cultivates wheat and some grass as forage for the livestock. 

Now, this hard-working young woman asks financial support to be able to enlarge her livestock. 

This loan of USD 3,000 will greatly help her to purchase two cows and forage for the livestock. 

Anna hopes that lenders will give their support and she will be able to enlarge her farming business.

loans.use: to pay for two cows and forage for the livestock

loans.name: Marcelo

texts.en:
Marcelo is married with five children; he operates a service-based business providing transportation in their community to make a living. His wife is selling grocery goods in their own general store, and they earns well for the family.  

He borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy spare parts and renew the registration.  

He plans to improve his business by having another unit of motorcycle for rental and transportation services. 

In the future, Marcelo wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and renew the registration.

loans.name: Hernando De Jesús

texts.es: Hernando es un hombre humilde de 49 años que trabaja en un cultivo de flores como operario agrícola y en su tiempo libre presta los servicios de poda y corte de césped y jardines. Su crédito lo quiere invertir en la compra de una novillona, pues tiene experiencia en el manejo de estos animales y en su casa tiene potreros que no están siendo utilizados, por lo que alternará esta actividad con las que ya realiza, con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos y darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Hernando is a humble man, age 49, who works as a farm worker, growing flowers.  In his free time he offers pruning and lawn mowing services.  His loan is to invest in the purchase of a heifer, because he has experience caring for these animals and at his house he has pastures that aren’t being used.  So he will add this work to those jobs he already does, with the goal of improving his income and giving his family a better way of life.

loans.use: to buy a heifer

loans.name: Luis Hernán

texts.es: Luis es un hombre adulto, padre de 5 hijos mayores de edad, quien hace más de 30 años se dedica a la venta y reparación de sombrillas, en un local en la ciudad de Medellín. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de sombrillas y tela para la reparación de estas, para luego venderlas a un mejor precio y así generar más ingresos para el sustento de su familia.  Luis sueña con hacer crecer su negocio y mejorar los ingresos de su familia, así como hacer que su negocio sea reconocido por la calidad de su trabajo.
texts.en: Luis is a grown man, father of five adult children.  For more than 30 years he has worked selling and repairing umbrellas in a shop in the city of Medellín.  He will invest this loan in the purchase of umbrellas and fabric to repair umbrellas, to later sell them at a higher price and, in this way, earn a higher income to take care of his family.  Luis dreams of making his business grow and improving his family’s income, and making his business well-known for the quality of his work.

loans.use: to buy umbrellas and fabric to repair umbrellas

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
José tiene 46 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Lagunas, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposa se dedica a la labor de crianza y venta de animales menores en la parte posterior a su domicilio, también se dedica a las labores agrícolas, ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales para posteriormente ofrecerlos a un mejor precio a sus clientes, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
José is 46 years old and lives with his wife and children in the District of Lagunas. The people engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. This community is located an hour away from the city of Chiclayo, which is in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

José and his wife raise and sell small animals in an area behind their house. They also engage in farming. He is requesting a loan of 500 PEN so that he can buy balanced animal feed for fattening his animals. When he sells the animals at a later time, he will be able to get a better price from his customers. This will generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Virgen Del Carmen De Yuncaypata Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA” de la Asociación Arariwa y viven en el distrito de Cusco de la provincia del Cusco, Perú. 

Tisalia tiene 22 años de edad,es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo, ella se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales por ejemplo chanchos,cuyes y pollos,ella los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, ella también estudia contabilidad en una universidad de la ciudad del Cusco y quiere salir adelante y ser profesional. Ya son varios años que Tisalia se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. Tisalia en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes,chanchos y pollos.

Los demás socios se dedican a la ganadería, a la agricultura, a la venta de comida, crianza de animales menores y otros brindan servicios profesionales. Los socios agradecen a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA” communal bank from the Asociación Arariwa. They live in the district of Cuzco in the province of Cuzco, Peru.   

Tisalia is 22 years old. She is in a common law marriage and has 1 child. She works raising animals such as pigs, guinea pigs and chickens. She raises them and fattens them up to sell at different markets. She also studies accounting at a university in the city of Cuzco and she wants to get ahead and be a professional. Tisalia has been doing this business for several years and it is going very well. At this time, Tisalia needs the loan to buy guinea pigs, pigs and chickens.

The other members work with livestock, farming, selling food, raising small animals and offering professional services. The members are grateful to the people who have been a part of this dream in this way and they are committed to making their payments on time.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Khairiniso

texts.ru:
59-летняя Хайринисо, проживающая в районе Шахритус, начинает свой бизнес по выпечке таджикских лепешек. У нее есть опыт в этой сфере. В течение полтора года она работала в пекарне, выпекала и продавала лепешки. Теперь она хочет открыть свою пекарню и сделать на этом семейный бизнес. 
В Таджикистане без лепешек не обходится ни одна будничная трапеза, ни один праздничный стол; иной, идя в гости, непременно приносит пару штук лепешек, да и любые гостеприимные хозяева, в комплекте с угощением, уходящим гостям, раздают по лепешке. Вовсе не случайно и глубокое уважение к хлебу независимо от социального положения и возраста таджиков, ведь лепешка – это высшая ценность народа, каждой семьи.
Хайринисо хорошо знает тонкости выпекания лепешки на тануре (в специальной печи). Рядом с домом Хайринисо уже построила маленькую пекарню. Теперь она просит кредит, чтобы закупить сырье - муку и уголь для производства лепешки. В этом деле ей будет помогать сын. Благодаря кредиту она сможет начать свой бизнес и очень надеется на финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
59-year-old Khairiniso, who lives in the Shahrituz District, is beginning her own business baking Tajik lepyoshki (Central Asian bread). She has experience in this field. Over the last year and a half, she has worked in a bakery, baking and selling lepyoshki. Now she wants to open her own bakery and make a family business out of it.

In Tajikistan, without leyoshki you can't have a workday meal or a celebratory feast; Otherwise, going over to someone's house as guest, it is essential to bring a few lepyoshka rolls. Indeed, any hospitable host will distribute lepyoshki to leaving guests along with a take-away portion of the meal. It's entirely not a coincidence that Tajiks of every age and social class have a reverence towards bread. Lepyoshka is the highest value of the Tajik people and of every family.

Khairiniso knows very well all the intricacies of baking lepyoshki in a tandoor oven. Khairinso has also constructed a small bakery close to her house. Now she is requesting a loan to buy raw materials (flour and coal) to make lepyoshki. Her son will help her with this business. Thanks to the loan, she will be able to start her own business. She really relies on this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy raw materials (coal and flour) in order to open a bakery and begin making lepyoshki (Central Asian bread).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials: blocks, cement, zinc sheeting, iron, gravel and sand.

loans.name: Paola

texts.es:
Paola es la menor de ocho hermanos, vive en la zona sur de la ciudad de Cochabamba, junto con su mamá, tres de sus hermanos y varios sobrinos, en una sola casa. Paola nos comenta que solo dos de sus hermanos son profesionales y dos decidieron emigrar a Europa donde trabajan de albañiles y cuidando personas mayores.
 
Paola estudió contaduría pública en la universidad estatal, pero no pudo concluir con su graduación debido a que su papá falleció y tuvo que empezar a trabajar para ayudar a su mamá y hermanos. Su mamá está muy enferma por lo que necesita muchos cuidados y medicamentos. 

Paola solicita un crédito educativo para poder lograr graduarse y obtener su título en Contaduría Pública, de este modo, tendrá la oportunidad de cumplir su sueño que tuvo desde niña que es de trabajar en Impuestos Nacionales, lo cual le permitirá mejorar su situación económica y así ayudar a su mamá y hermanos y en un futuro poder conformar su propia familia.

Paola de antemano agradece a las personas que a través de sus recursos económicos ayudan a otros y generan nuevas oportunidades de crecimiento, así como a ella se le están otorgando ahora.
texts.en:
Paola is the youngest of eight siblings.  She lives in the southern part of the city of Cochabamba.  She lives together with her mom, three of her siblings, and various nieces and nephews, in just one house.  Paola tells us that only two of her siblings are professionals, and two decided to move to Europe, where they work as construction workers and caring for the elderly.

Paola studied public accounting in the state university, but she couldn’t finish with her graduation because her father died and she had to begin to work to help her mom and her siblings.  Her mom is very sick, so she needs a lot of care and medicines.

Paola is asking for an education loan to be able to graduate and get her degree in Public Accounting.  In this way, she will have the chance to make a dream she has had since she was a little girl come true—to work in the national tax office.  This will allow her to improve her financial situation and help her mother and siblings.  In the future she will be able to make her own family.

Paola thanks in advance the people who, through their financial resources, help others and create new opportunities for growth, just as they are doing for her now.

loans.use: to pay for her graduation and get her degree in Public Accounting

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es: Es una mujer alegre, originaria de Puerto Cabezas, acompañada, tiene 42 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos de 17, 11,7 y de 1 año de edad. Trabaja como voluntaria en una organización, solamente recibe una pequeña ayuda económica, su esposo trabaja como conductor. Con el objetivo de apoyar en la educación de sus tres hijos en edad escolar, solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar materiales escolares: mochila, zapatos, calcetines, uniformes, matrícula y pagar las 3 tres primeras mensualidades de colegiatura, cuadernos, lapiceros. La mayor de 17 años estudia su quinto año de secundaria en Managua. Su sueño es que sus hijos sean profesionales y construir su propia vivienda de concreto, ya que actualmente habita en una pequeña casa de madera de su mama, la cual es compartida aproximadamente por 11 familiares.
texts.en:
This cheerful woman is originally from Puerto Cabezas. She is 42 years old, in a relationship, and has four children (ages 17, 11, 7, and 1). She works as a volunteer for an organization and only receives a small amount of financial assistance. Her husband works as a driver.

With the intent of helping her three school-age children with their education, she is requesting her first loan in order to buy school supplies such as backpacks, shoes, socks, notebooks, and pens. She will also pay the first three monthly tuition installments. Her oldest child, age 17, is in her fifth year of secondary school in Managua.

The borrower dreams of seeing her children become professionals and building a house of her own made of concrete. She currently resides at her mother’s house, a small wooden structure, with 11 other family members.

loans.use: to pay her children's tuition and to buy school supplies and uniforms.

loans.name: Alba Rosa

texts.es: Alba es una mujer emprendedora, madre de 3 hijas y quien desde hace 15 años inició su propio negocio de confección de ropa a terceros y a la reparación de prendas desde su casa. Alba se animó para empezar al ver que su esposo no iba a poder dar estudio a sus hijas y ella soñaba con que fueran profesionales. Inicialmente tenía dos máquinas familiares y ahora tiene 6 máquinas, gracias a los créditos que le ha hecho la entidad. Ella quiere invertir el crédito en la compra de una máquina ojaladora, ya que la que tiene es muy vieja y está mala. Alba sueña con hacer crecer su negocio y mejorar su nivel de ingresos, para obtener mayor utilidad y poder emplear a mujeres cabeza de familia en su empresa.
texts.en:
Alba is an enterprising woman.  She is the mother of three children.  Fifteen years ago she started her own business as a subcontractor who makes clothing and repairs garments from her home. Alba was motivated to get started when she saw that her husband wasn’t going to be able to give an education to her daughters; she dreamed that they would become professionals. 

Initially, she had two family sewing machines and now she has six, thanks to the loans that the institution has granted her.  She wants to invest this loan in the purchase of a sewing machine that makes buttonholes, because the one she has is old and bad.  Alba dreams of making her business grow and improving her income.  In this way she could be more useful and could employ female heads of household in her business.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine that makes button holes.

loans.name: Beatriz Eugenia

texts.es: Beatriz es una mujer de 54 años dedicada a su tienda de abarrotes y productos varios desde hace 28 años, momento en el cual decide apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa y poder estar al cuidado de su hijo de apenas un año de edad. Actualmente le va bien en el negocio, ya que está ubicado sobre la vía principal de la vereda donde vive y al lado de la única cancha deportiva del sector, por lo que ya es conocida por todos sus vecinos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más surtido (mecato, galletería, gaseosas, lácteos y otros) y más variedad de productos para vender en la tienda. Beatriz sueña con ampliar y mejorar su negocio y comprar una mesa de billar, con lo que incrementaría sus ingresos y su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Beatriz is a 54 year-old woman who has works in her own small general store. Twenty-eight years ago she decided to support her husband with the household expenses and be able to care for her son, who was barely one year old.  

These days her business is going well for her because it is located on a main road where she lives, next to the only sports field in the area.  So her business is well-known by all the neighbors.  She will invest this loan in the purchase of more merchandise (pastries, cookies, soda, dairy products, and other items) and a wider variety of products to sell in her store.  

Beatriz dreams of expanding and improving her business, and buying a pool table, so she could increase her income and her living conditions.

loans.use: to stock merchandise (pastries, cookies, soda, dairy products, and other items)

loans.name: Maria Elvira

texts.es:
María Elvira tiene 44 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Buenos Aires, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores desde hace 05 años en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Elvira is 44 years old and lives with her husband and children in the District of Buenos Aires. This community is known for agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. It is located in Morropon Province, which is part of the region of Piura on the northern coast of Peru.

María Elvira has been raising small animals for the past five years in an area behind her house. She is requesting a loan of 1,000 PEN in order to buy balanced feed for fattening her animals. This will enable her to generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for fattening her animals.

loans.name: Parvina

texts.ru: Парвина 27-летняя незамужняя девушка из города Худжанд. Она живет с матерью и младшим братом. Три года назад научившись кройке и шитью у одной мастерицы, Парвина начала свой швейный бизнес. Она шьет по своему фасону женские национальные платья. Сейчас ей не хватают ткани, чтобы сшить заказные платья. Для этой цели она просит кредит и ожидает поддержки.
texts.en: Parvina is a 27-year-old unmarried girl from the city of Khujand.  She lives with her mother and younger brother.  Three years ago, she started her own sewing business after learning the trade from an experienced seamstress.  She sews Tajikistani dresses using patterns she came up with herself.  At the moment, she doesn't have enough fabric to sew all the dresses that people have ordered from her.  As such, she's seeking a loan to buy more fabric and is counting on your help.

loans.use: buy fabric for sewing dresses

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is 39 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell.

Nora has borrowed and repaid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns an income from a buy-and-sell fish business.

She aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Hiba

texts.en:
Hiba is a 21-year-old single lady who is well known in her region because she has an excellent reputation and special talent for communication.

She is a hard worker who puts so much effort into developing her knowledge and widening her educational level.

Hiba has been employed with a company for seven months and she is very happy that, through this job, she can afford to pay her educational fees and cover her needs.

Today she is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, to pay for her increasing university tuition fees so she can fulfill her dream of finishing her education and start her own career path in the future.

Hiba is the sole breadwinner to two additional family members.  She works hard to provide them with their necessary living needs and requests as much as she can.

loans.use: To pay for her increasing university tuition fees

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 42-years-old and married with four children.  With three children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Jocelyn has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es: Joel es un hombre de 52 años, dedicado a la compra y venta de chatarra, se ubica en una de las plazas de mercado de la ciudad y desde allí trabaja, pero alterna su actividad con el acarreo de materiales y mercados a los clientes del sector. Joel es muy conocido en la plaza por sus servicios y honestidad. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de acero y chatarra, con lo que pretende incrementar sus ingresos y cambiar su carro por otro más grande.
texts.en:
Joel is a 52-year-old man who works at his business of buying and selling scrap metal at one of the market plazas in the city. He divides his time between hauling materials to the market and visiting with his customers in the area. Joel is well-known at the plaza for his service and his honesty.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of steel and scrap metal. He intends to increase his earnings and replace his car with a larger one.

loans.use: to buy recycled steel and scrap metal.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn in bulk quantities.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en: Rosemary wants a loan to buy produce, maize, rice, groundnuts and beans to sell. She is 37-years-old and married with four children living in Hoima, Uganda. She ventured into business to get an income to meet her family's needs and complement her husband's income as they say two heads work better than one.  However, her business is hindered by inadequate capital and high transportation costs affect her service delivery. Rosemary's dream is to expand her business and become a leading supplier of produce in her area.

loans.use: to buy produce, maize, rice, groundnuts and beans to sell.

loans.name: Carina

texts.en:
Carina is 26-years-old with one child. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell.

Carina has been in this business for three years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Sadoqat

texts.ru: Садокат вежливая, умная и ответственная женщина. Она с семьёй живет на районе Спитамен. Ей всего 34 лет. Уже несколько лет она занимается шитьем национальной одежды. Она решилась начать новую деятельность в сфере животноводства. Она любит животных и давно хотела начать этот бизнес. Садокат просит кредит на сумму $1500, чтобы купить необходимое количество телят. Она давно мечтала начать маленький бизнес именно в этой сфере деятельности. Садокат верит, что с Вашей помощью ей удастся реализовать задуманное. Поддержите Садокат.
texts.en: Sadoqat is a polite, clever and responsible woman.  She lives with her family in the Spitamen region of Tajikistan.  She is 34 years old and has been working as a seamstress for a few years.  She recently decided to start farming livestock as well.  She loves animals and has wanted to raise livestock for a long time.  She is requesting a loan of $1500 to buy the calves she needs to start her new livestock-farming business, and has hope that, with your help, all will go as planned.  Help Sadoqat.

loans.use: buy as many cattle as she needs to start up her new livestock-farming business

loans.name: Luis Filiberto

texts.es: el señor Luis Filiberto es un señor bien trabajador labora en la alcaldia como vigilante desde hace 9 años. es casado tiene tres hijos  por quien  se esfuerza  dia a dia  labora de lunes a domingo, solicita el financiamienot para comprar  libros escolares que le estan pidiendo a sus hijos  y terminar de alistarlos con los uniformes.
texts.en: Señor Luis Filiberto is a hard-working man. He has been working as a watchman for the municipality for 9 years. He is married and has three children for whom he exerts himself day after day. He works from Monday to Sunday. He is applying for the loan to buy schoolbooks that they are requesting his children to have and to complete their enrollment with their uniforms.

loans.use: to buy school books and notebooks for his children

loans.name: Janepher

texts.en:
Janepher is a farmer and lives in the Kitale area of North Rift Kenya with her husband and four children.  She loves farming, especially dairy farming, and has been doing it for eight years.  Her primary source of income is milk and crops.  She experiences her biggest challenge when her animals are sick.

Janepher chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because of their quick loan processing and its low interest rates.  During the training, she learned about better dairy farming.  She said that this loan will act as a source of income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs.

loans.name: Esmerito Reymundo

texts.es: el señor Esmerito es casado tiene dos hijos en edad escolar, labora como vigilante en la alcaldia desde hace 13 años se esfuerza por sacar adelante a su familia, labora de lunes a viernes, aveces realiza horas extras para que su salario le salga un poco mejor, es un hombre muy luchador, poco a poco ha mejorado su vivienda, solicita el financiamiento para cambiar el techo de su casa  antes que venga el invierno y que su familia no se moje.
texts.en:
Sr. Esmerito is married and has two school aged children. He has been working as a town security guard for 13 years and is making an effort to help his family get ahead. He works from Monday to Friday and at times works overtime in order to earn a bit more. 

He is a very hardworking man and he has gradually been improving his dwelling. He is requesting funding to replace the roof of his house before winter comes so that his family will not get drenched.

loans.use:
to purchase construction materials, such as wood, zinc, nails, cement and blocks
to replace his roof.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay his tuition fee

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a boarding house rental business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 27,000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials such as wood, nails, paints, etc for the repair of her boarding house rental business.

Analiza has been in this business for seven years. Analiza earns more income from motorcycle transport.

Analiza has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like wood, nails and paints to repair her business

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Zenaida works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines, and earns additional income as a rice retailer.  

Zenaida, who has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF, is now borrowing PHP 30000 to purchase items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Micheal

texts.en: Micheal, age 64, is requesting a loan to buy more assorted drinks like beer to sell. He lives in Hoima, Uganda and used his savings from civil service to open up a lodge and pool business to supplement his income. He faces the difficulty of high transportation costs from the beer depot to his selling point. Micheal desires to see his children graduate so that they can be self-dependent.

loans.use: to buy more assorted drinks like beer to sell.

loans.name: Yughaber

texts.en:
Yughaber lives with her husband in Hoghmik village. Their children are married and live separately.

Yughaber and her husband are farmers. They keep livestock and cultivate land. The livestock currently includes cows, calves, sheep and chickens. The land that they own isn't big and they only cultivate barley. 

Yughaber has now applied for this loan of USD 1,500 to enlarge their cultivation activities. She would like to purchase seeds, fertilizer, and fuel and cultivate different types of vegetables.

Yughaber will be very grateful to the lenders if they support her agribusiness.

loans.use: to pay for seeds, fertilizer and fuel for land cultivation

loans.name: Jalolidin

texts.ru:
Чалолидин простой и скромный мужчина. Он  заботливый отец пятерых детей и любящий муж. С самого раннего детство занимается скотоводством. Но последнее пятнадцать лет его занятие стало его основным доходом. Так как он имеет большую семью, ему приходится одновременно заниматься несколькими делами. Чалолидин умело совмещает скотоводство и дехканское хозяйство. В основном разводит, откармливает и продаёт КРС и МРС. Этим получает свой доход, которое тратит на жильё, учебу детей и проживания. Чалолидин с женой стараются также отложить на поступление хоть одного из его детей в ВУЗ. Очень хочет, чтобы его дети стали образованными, ведь из-за обстоятельства он сам не смог учиться.  

 Пользуясь случаем и сезонностью, он хочет приобрести дополнительно корову и корм для скота. Но не хочет трогать свои заначки, так как  заново копить денег будет тяжело, а дети уже подросли. В надежде на помощь и поддержку Чалолидин обратился в МДО «Арванд». Он очень надеется, что сможет приобрести нужную сумму и реализовать свои планы. Благодарит «Кива» за положительную роль в его жизни.
texts.en:
Jalolidin is a simple and modest man. He is an attentive father to five children and a beloved husband. From very early on in his childhood, he has practiced livestock breeding. However, for the past 15 years, this activity has served as main source of income. As he has a big family, it is necessary for him to simultaneously work several jobs. Jalolidin has been able to combine livestock breeding and collective crop farming. He mainly raises, fattens up and sells cattle and sheep. From this he earns an income which he spends on housing, his children's education and living expenses. Jalolidin and his wife also strive to put aside money for even just one of their children to enroll in university. He really wants his children to become highly educated, because he was unable to go to university due to his circumstances.

Taking advantage of the seasonal opportunity, he wants to buy an additional cow and livestock feed. But he does not want to touch his savings, as to start saving money again would be difficult and his children are already teenagers. In the hope of getting help and support, Jalolidin turned to MDO Arvand. He really hopes that he will be able to obtain the necessary amount and fulfill his plans. He thanks Kiva for its positive role in his life.

loans.use: to buy a cow and livestock feed.

loans.name: León Jaime

texts.es:
León es un adulto mayor, que ha dedicado toda su vida a la reparación de carros viejos, para luego venderlos o ponerlos a trabajar. Él aprendió el oficio de mecánico, trabajando desde niño al lado de su padre. Pretende invertir el crédito en la reparación de dos vehículos viejos que tiene actualmente y ponerlos a trabajar en la movilización de pasajeros y hacer trasteos.

Su sueño es tener varios vehículos para ponerlos a trabajar y producir mayores ingresos, con los que pueda mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
León is an older man who has worked all his life repairing old cars to later sell or put to work. He learned the mechanic's trade by working as a child at the side of his father. He intends to invest the loan in repairing two old vehicles that he now has and putting them to work carrying passengers and transporting items.

His dream is to have a number of vehicles to put to work and produce greater income, with which he could improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to repair two old vehicles

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: el señor Manuel trabaja como vigilante en la alcaldia desde hace 8 años , es padre de dos hijos todos en edad escolar, poco a poco ha venido luchando con sus hijos por sacar adelante sus estudios, y mejorando  su vivienda, el financiamiento lo esta solicitando para acondicionar un cuarto en su casa .
texts.en:
Sr. Manuel has been working as a town security guard for 8 years. He is the father of two children, both of whom are school aged. He has been struggling little by little to help his children get ahead in their studies and also to improve his house. 

He is requesting a loan to remodel a room in his house.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials, such as bricks, cement and sand, in order to remodel a room.

loans.name: Avelita

texts.en:
Avelita is a native from Cortes, Bohol.  She is 28-years-old. She provides manicure and pedicure services for her main source of income.  Her cosmetology business started almost five years ago. She is asking for a loan to buy additional materials to use and to pay for transportation so she can answer the demands of her customers and be able to meet the family's daily needs. 

In the future, Avelita hopes to open a beauty parlor to accommodate the growing number of customers in her place and also to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy additional materials to use and pay for transportation

loans.name: Sinan's Group

texts.en:
Sinan, 25, is married and lives with her husband in a village of the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province. She and her husband are farmers who grow rice and cassava. Having been in this business for several years, she is able to earn about 30,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
Sinan’s group consists of three members, who all are female. She is a first cycle client with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is requesting a loan with VisionFund.  Sinan, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her crop yields and earn more income to better improve her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina, who is married, works hard to support her family. For two years now she has been selling fruits and vegetables in the Philippines.

Regina has requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of vegetables to sell. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Maa Saraswati Shg Group

texts.en:
Sainta is a 42-year-old married woman who has two children. She lives in a village in the Sonepur district of Odisha, India. Sainta is a housewife who is very happy and responsible. She alternates her household activities with work in her business. She has a business growing vegetables and paddy and sells the crops in the market in the Sonepur district of Odisha, India. She has had this business for four years and it is going very well. 

At this time, Sainta is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, seeds and new and advanced tools for farming. She says that this will help her in strengthening the business and responding to client demand. This group is made up of neighbors and friends who formed the group "Maa Saraswati Self Help Group" (named after the Goddess Saraswati). The members of the group have selected Sainta as their president. The lady standing with her hand raised in the photo is Sainta. The common goal of this group is to increase their business activity.

loans.use: To pay for fertilizers, seeds and tools for farming.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es: la señor Flor de Maria  tiene la edad de 48 años labora para el fet salud desde hace 28 años , en su centro de trabajo su funsion es responsable de higiene , la señora es soltera y madre de dos hijos que estan en universidad , ella es una señora muy responsable y luchadora , poco a poco ha sacado adelante los estudios de sus hijos  , sueña con verlos todos unos profesionales , solicita el financiamiento para mejoras de su vivienda para darles mejor calidad a su hogar
texts.en:
Flor de Maria is 48 years old and has worked in healthcare for 28 years.  In her workplace she is responsible for hygiene.  She is a single mother of two sons that are both attending university.  She is a very responsible and hard-working woman.  Little by little she has been able to help her sons with the cost of their educations.  She dreams to see them working as professionals.

She is seeking a loan to improve her home so that she can have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, and gravel.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric, rings, liners, thread, glue, etc.

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en: Narcisa, a mother of three, lives with her family in the village where farming is the main source of income. For the past six years of farming, she earned a better income for her family. With her generated income, she has successfully repaid her previous loan used on their farm. To increase her farm produce, she took a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to cover weeding maintenance costs. In the future, she wants to live comfortably and improve the general living situation of her family.

loans.use: to cover weeding maintenance costs

loans.name: Sot

texts.en:
Sot, 50-years-old, is a married father of five children who lives in a rural village of the Moung Russey district, Cambodia. To support his family, Sot has been farming rice and planting pineapple for 15 years in the village. The current business earns him about 50,000 KHR per day. 

Sot has been with VisionFund for three cycles and he has successfully used his past loans from VisionFund to better support his family. Now, he is requesting a loan.  He will use his portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for his farmland. He hopes to increase his crop yields and sell them for a good price to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for his farmland

loans.name: Pumamarca Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “PUMAMARCA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de San Jeronimo, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             

Casiana tiene 40 años y su negocio es la venta de útiles de escritorio como por ejemplo lapiceros, cuadernos,hojas, borradores, folderes y otras cosas mas, ella desde hace varios atrás que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mas mercadería como por ejemplo cuadernos pues esta empezando el año escolar. 

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de crianza de animales, negocio de venta de cuyes, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de ropa.

 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank called “PUMAMARCA.”  It is located in San Jeronimo District, which is a part of Cusco Province and Cusco Department.                                                                                                                                                                                             

Casiana is 40-years old.  Her business is selling office supplies like, for example, pens, notebooks, paper, folders and many other things.  She has made her living from this business for many years, and it is going very well for her.  Casiana needs a loan at this time to purchase more merchandise like, for example, notebooks, as the school year is starting. 

The other members of the communal bank make their livings raising and selling animals, selling guinea pigs, running a small grocery and selling clothing. 
 
Casiana is grateful to those who are helping her realize her dream in this way, and she promises to comply with the established repayment plan.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise like, for example, notebooks.

loans.name: Sadafmohi

texts.ru:
Садафмохи проживает в городе Куляб. Она молодая незамужняя девушка в возрасте 23 лет. Ее семья состоит из шестеро человек: отца, матери, двух братьев, сестры и ее самой. Ее отец пенсионер, а мать домохозяйка. Старший брат работает в России, а младший брат и младшая сестра учатся в школе. 
Садафмо после окончания школы начала зарабатывать на жизнь. Она изучила профессию швеи и в течение около 5 лет занимается шитьем. Садафмохи в основном вышивает подушки, курпача (узкое стеганое одеяло для сиденья) и курпа (стеганые покрывала). В деятельности ей помогают также мать и сестра. Садафмохи берет кредит для купли новой швейной машинки, так как ее собственная уже устарела и причиняет ей неудобства в процессе работы. Благодаря кредиту она сможет расширить свое дело.
texts.en:
Sadafmohi lives in the city of Kulyab. She is a young, unmarried, 23-year-old woman. Her family is made up of six people: her father, her mother, her two brothers, her sisters and herself. Her father is retired and her mother is a homemaker. Her eldest brother works in Russia. Her younger brother and sister are in school.

After graduating from school, Sadafmohi began earning a living. She learned the seamstress profession and has been sewing for about five years. Sadafmohi primarily sews pillows, kurpachas (a narrow quilted blanket for sitting on) and kurpas (a narrow throw). Her mother and sister also help with this business. Sarafmohi is requesting a loan to buy a new sewing machine as her own sewing machine is outdated and causes her discomfort while she works. Thanks to the loan, she will be able to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine to expand her sewing business.

loans.name: Marisol  De Los Angeles

texts.es: Marisol tiene 29 años de edad, originaria de San Marcos, Masatepe. Soltera, estudia en una de las universidades de la ciudad. Su principal meta es estudiar un posgrado. Solicita el crédito para cancelar el título y su curso de pre-especialización. El crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá obtener su título de licenciada el Contabilidad y así lograra crecer profesionalmente. Su plan futuro es estudiar una Maestría.
texts.en:
Marisol is 29 years old and she is from San Marcos, Masatepe.  She is single and she studies in one of the universities in the city.  Her goal is to get a post-graduate education.  

She is seeking a loan so that she can pay off the cost of a degree and her courses.  The credit will be a big help so that she will be able to get her accounting degree and license, which will help her grow professionally.  She plans to study for a Master’s degree in the future.

loans.use: to pay off the title and cost of courses for her degree.

loans.name: Baba Pathargad Shg Group

texts.en:
Baba Pathargad Self Help Group (SHG) consists of ten women from a village in Odisha, India. They formed a group to help themselves by sharing their problems and solving their problems among them. 

One of them is Sapur, who was selected as the president of Baba Pathargad SHG. One lady standing with her hand raised in the photo is Sapur. Sapur is 34 years old and is living with her husband and her four children. Three children are in school and one is only 2 years old. She hopes to give a better education to their children.

Sapur has 3 acres of land in her village, and she is using her land to grow sugarcane. Her husband is supporting her in this activity. The group has requested a loan of 150,000 Indian rupees. Sapur will use her portion to purchase the required resources for sugarcane cultivation. She says a portion of the loan will help her to purchase sugarcane plants, fertilizers, and insecticides and will cover operational expenses such as labor charges.

loans.use: to purchase sugarcane plants, fertilizers and insecticides

loans.name: Everth Manuel

texts.es: el señor Everth trabaja desde hace seis años como docente  en tonala, es un señor muy trabajador y se ha esforzado por brindarle a sus hijos buena educación, sacandolos adelante poco a poco, solicita el financiamiento para mejoras de su vivienda, desea complementar las puertas  y terminar de poner ceramica a su casa.
texts.en: Everth has been working for six years as a teacher in Tonala. He is a hard worker and has strived to provide his children with a good education, getting them ahead little by little. He is requesting a loan to improve his living conditions. He wants to complete the doors and finish placing the ceramic tiles in his house.

loans.use: to purchase building materials for two doors and tiles.

loans.name: Maa Narayani Shg Group

texts.en: The group Maa Narayani Self Help Group (SHG) has 11 members who are all from the same neighborhood. The lady standing with her hand raised in the photo is Rebati. She is the leader of the group. Rebati is a 26-year-old woman married to a worker. The couple has two children who are in school. Rebati lives with her children and, together with her husband, takes care of all the household expenses. In order to help with all the family expenses, Rebati has been involved in doing paddy cultivation and selling it to distributors for the past five years. She supplies her rice to the rice dealers in the nearby market. In order to strengthen the business and respond to client demand, Rebati, together with the group Maa Narayani Shg, is requesting a loan from Peoples Forum to purchase fertilizers, pesticides, seeds and to cover their operational costs. Their goal is to increase their business activity.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers, pesticides, seeds etc.

loans.name: Milagros Del Pilar

texts.es:
Milagros del Pilar tiene 19 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hija en el Caserío de Cascarrillo, una zona rural del distrito de Buenos Aires, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza, chicha de jora y clarito helado, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de sacos de maíz amarillo, azúcar para la elaboración de sus productos y de esta manera preparar mayor cantidad de sus productos, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Milagros de Pilar is 19 years old and she lives with her husband and their daughter in Caserío de Cascarrillo, a rural area in the Buenos Aires district.  The area's population mostly works in agriculture, commerce, and in raising animals.  The region is located in Piura, on the northern coast of Peru.

She sells beer, "chica de jora" (a traditional Peruvian drink made from corn), and clarito ice cream (also made from corn).  Her business is located in the back part of her home.  She has asked for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles so that she can buy sacks of yellow corn and sugar in order to make her products. By doing this she can increase the quantity of her products and generate a higher income for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making "chicha de jora" and "clarito" (traditional Peruvian drinks).

loans.name: Maa Khambeswari Shg Group

texts.en:
Maa Khambeswari Self Help Group is a group consisting of 10 members, all of whom are women. These entrepreneurs are very humble, hardworking and responsible people with good manners and lots of enthusiasm to improve their lives. A few years back, they were all facing the same kind of poverty, so they planned to start a general store where they could provide basic household consumables to their customers. 

One of them is Mrs. Droupadi who was selected as their president. Droupadi is a 38-year-old lady living with her husband and her two children, who are students. The lady standing with her hand raised in the photo is Droupadi. Her husband works as a laborer in a factory situated near her village. She runs a general store to help her husband financially. She sells rice, grains, lentils, edible oil, spices, biscuits, soap, detergent, hair oil, etc., in her shop. She has developed a very good relationship with her customers in the village. She likes the fact that she can cater to the needs of the people in her village. She has a plan to make her shop bigger and keep multiple things in her shop to satisfy her customers. She also wants to purchase items for her shop in bulk directly from the wholesalers. She has requested a loan to purchase items like toothbrushes, toothpaste, soft drinks, wheat flour, grains and other household consumables.

loans.use: To  pay for toothbrushes, toothpaste, soft drinks, wheat flour, grains and other household items

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María tiene 32 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad con gran cantidad de ripio y piedras que la población utiliza para la construcción de viviendas, también se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposo tienen una bodeguita donde ofrecen abarrotes, bebidas, golosinas, desde hace tres años, son una familia unida que se esfuerza en la labor que realizan, María ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de abarrotes sacos de arroz, azúcar, harina, aceite entre otros para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manea generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María, 32, lives with her husband and children in the Cayaltí district of the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.  In that community there's a lot of rubble and stones that people use for building homes.  The residents also work in agriculture, commerce, and ranching.

For three years she and her husband have had a little grocery store where they sell groceries, beverages, and snacks.  They're a close family and they work hard.

María requested a loan for 2,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to make a wholesale purchase of sacks of rice, sugar, flour, oil, and other groceries to sell to her customers and earn more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Angie Johana

texts.es:
Ella es  Angie Johanna, tiene 22 años, vive con el esposo y la hija Emilie. Angie es una persona, responsable, honesta con metas y sueños por cumplir, una de las metas es terminar el técnico de Atención Integral a la Primera Infancia. Carrera que escogió porque piensa que un ser humano se forma con valores y principios pero sobretodo con una educación por el cual los niños y niñas se puedan formar desde los primeros años de vida.
Cree firmemente en la cita de Pitágoras “educad al niño para que no tengas que reprender al hombre”. Uno de los sueños después de terminar este técnico es estudiar pedagogía y psicología infantil puesto que quiere darle todo lo mejor a la hija empezando por una buena educación y ayudarle a la familia.
Esta estudiante era una de las beneficiarias por gestores en crecimiento, ya que ellos decidieron dar por terminado el convenio con el instituto.
A el esposo Oscar, quien es el apoyo de ella, le queda complicado pagar la pensión que ofrece campo alto, ya que la única persona que devenga en el hogar, por esto le solicita a Kiva le pueda dar el subsidio para poder continuar con este proyecto tan importante para ella.
texts.en:
This is Angie Johanna, 22. She lives with her husband and their daughter Emilie. Angie is a responsible and honest person with goals and dreams. One of her goals is to finish her degree in Comprehensive Early Childhood Care. A degree she chose because she thinks a human being is made of values and principles but above all with education which can form children in the early years. She strongly believes in Pythagoras’ quote “educate the children and it won't be necessary to punish the men.” 

One of her dreams after finishing this degree is studying pedagogy and child psychology because she wants to give the best to her daughter, starting with a good education and help her family. This student was one of the beneficiaries for growth manager but they decided to terminate the agreement with the institution.

Her husband Oscar, who is her supporter, finds it difficult to pay the tuition that CampoAlto offers since he is the only person who earns in the household. This is why she is requesting a loan from Kiva who can give her the subsidy to be able to continue with this project that is very important to her.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of enrollment.

loans.name: Eleopoldo

texts.es:
Eleopoldo tiene 48 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijo en el Caserío de Laynas distrito de La Matanza una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público en su propia mototaxi, trasladando a sus pasajeros a los caseríos aledaños a su distrito, también se dedica a la venta de maíz amarillo, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de maíz para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Eleopoldo is 48 years old and lives with his wife and their son in Caserío de Laynas, a district in La Matanza.  The people in this community work in agriculture, commerce, and in raising animals.  It is located in the province of Morropon in the Piura region, on the northern coast of Peru.

He runs a public transport business with his moto-taxi, taking his passengers to the surrounding villages in the district.  He also sells yellow corn in bulk.  He is seeking a loan of 2000 nuevos soles so that he can purchase bulk yellow corn to sell to his customers.  By doing this he can generate a higher income for his family.

loans.use: to buy bulk yellow corn to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Pach's Group

texts.en:
Pach, aged 42, lives in a rural village located in the Moung Russey district with her husband and two children.  She and her husband are farmers who have been growing rice for 35 years, and sometimes she works for others for a fee.
