Con el ánimo de fortalecer y acreditar bien su negocio, solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar surtido al por mayor (lácteos, galletería, café, chocolate, pastas y otros productos de la canasta familiar), esto le permitirá fortalecer la variedad de productos que ofrece para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y así lograr mejores ingresos.
Liliana manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder hacer crecer su negocio y convertirlo en un minimercado, en el que los visitantes puedan encontrar todo lo que requieran a buen precio y de una excelente calidad, esto le dará la posibilidad de mejorar la calidad de vida y brindar una mejor educación a su hijo de 6 años.
texts.en:
Liliana is a very hard-working and driven woman of 30 years old. She has spent 8 of these years tending to her own business - a grocery store which she set up to generate income to support her husband with the household's expenditure.

The store is located in a neighborhood that is growing, which means that she is able to attract ever more customers and increase the level of profits that she can obtain through sales. With the aim of strengthening and gaining a good reputation for the business, Liliana is seeking the help of the loan to buy stock in bulk (dairy products, biscuits, coffee, chocolates, pasta and other products in the family's shopping basket). This will enable her to strengthen the variety of products that is offered to satisfy her customers' demands and therein have better income.

Liliana asserts that her greatest dream is to grow her business and turn it into a mini market in which those who come can find everything they need at a good price and of an excellent quality. This will give her the possibility of improving her quality of life and giving her 6-year-old a better education.

loans.use: to buy stock in bulk (dairy products, biscuits, coffee, chocolate, galletería, café, chocolate, pastas and other products in the family shopping basket).

loans.name: Cherry

texts.en:
Cherry is 39 years old, married, and has four children, who are all in school.  

Cherry is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 3,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her livestock. She has been raising livestock for nine years.

In the future, Cherry would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her livestock

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen is 31 years old, a married woman and the mother of two children. The man shown in the photo is Nasreen’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Nasreen has applied for a loan of PKR 35,000, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires and some auto spare parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Nasreen is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and some auto spare parts for the rickshaw.

loans.name: Meeran

texts.en: Meeran is a 47-year-old married woman. Her husband (also pictured) has been running a small bakery in their community for many years. He offers various baked goods such as biscuits, cupcakes and bread rolls. He is an expert baker who serves his community well and he earns a good income to cover the household expenses. To improve her husband’s business, Meeran has requested a loan of 50,000 Pakistani rupees (PKR) to purchase more stocks of bread, flour, yeast and oil at wholesale rates from the market. This will allow the bakery to consistently meet increasing demand. Meeran is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of bread, flour, yeast and oil.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem, age 53, is a married woman. She deals in animal sales. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family's income. 

With the support of Kashf Foundation she has gradually improved her business. Currently she is in her 3rd loan cycle and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more cattle. She expects boost in her earnings and wishes to spend part of income on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle.

loans.name: Kiran

texts.en: Kiran is 24-year-old married woman and the mother of two children. The man shown in the photo is Kiran’s husband, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Kiran has applied for a loan of PKR 30,000, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires and some auto spare parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Kiran is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and some auto spare parts.

loans.name: Rasheed

texts.en:
Rasheed is a 43-year-old married woman. She deals in cloth. She buys cloth of different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business.  She also sews clothes to generate an extra amount of income. 

Rasheed is requesting a 30,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory.  She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend the part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima was born in 1968. She is a widow and has one son. Fatima has been working at selling clothes for six months and it has become her only source of income. She is trying her best to provide her son with what he needs after his father's death. 

Now she is planning to buy more clothes and increase her merchandise so as to be able to continue her project. Fatima made an agreement with some customers regarding some clothes and is requesting a loan to be able to buy them.

loans.use: To increase her stock of merchandise.

loans.name: Las Productoras  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Las Productoras está formado por 8 mujeres que viven en la hermosa parroquia de Baños en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta parroquia es muy visitada por sus aguas termales que brotan de su volcán inactivo, cuenta con varios lugares para la recreación de grandes y pequeños y también se puede disfrutar de una rica gastronomía. Su gente al igual que todas las socias son mujeres amables y trabajadoras que luchan por el bienestar de sus familias.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Deisi, es la presidenta del grupo de crédito Las Productoras, participa activamente de este grupo desde hace 3 años, tiempo en el que los créditos le han servido  en el crecimiento de su negocio y de su hogar.
La Señora Deisi es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 3 años de edad, su esposo es de profesión mecánico y labora en un taller propio, la casa en la que viven es arrendada.
Doña Deisy se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y desde hace dos años a la venta de productos Naturales, su mercadería lo vende puerta a puerta y en cada momento que tenga una oportunidad. El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de productos naturales para sus clientes. Su sueño de poder conocer varios países.
texts.en:
The Las Productoras communal bank is made up of eight women who live in the beautiful parish of Baños in the city of Cuenca. This parish is highly frequented thanks to its hot springs which stem from its inactive volcano. The area has many places for the old and young to play and there is also a rich gastronomy here. Its people, just as the members of this group, are all friendly and hard-working women who fight for their families' well-being.

One of the members of this group is Deisi, she is the president of the Las Productoras communal bank. She has been actively participating in this group for three years, a period over which the loans have helped her to grow the business and improve her home.

Deisi is married and the fruit of her marriage is a 3-year-old son. Her husband works as a mechanic and works in his own workshop. The home in which they live is rented.

Deisi spends her time tending to the household chores, and for the last two years she has been selling natural products. She sells her merchandise from door to door and every moment she has an opportunity to do so. She will invest the money from the loan in natural products for her customers. Her dream is to get to know several countries.

loans.use: to buy natural products.

loans.name: Shameem

texts.en: Shameem is a 28-year-old married woman who has been raising and selling animals for many years. She started her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. She buys baby goats at low prices, raises them and then her husband sells them at the market. She makes a good amount of money to contribute to the family income. However, she needs to improve her business to cover her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation again and applied for a loan of 40,000 Pakistani rupees (PKR) to buy more baby goats. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely improve her business and income level.

loans.use: to buy more baby goats.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen is 52 years old, a married woman and the mother of five children. One of her son (also shown in the photo) is a rickshaw driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Nasreen has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000, for her son. He wants to buy new tires and some auto spare parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Nasreen is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and some auto spare parts.

loans.name: Imtiaz

texts.en:
Imtiaz is a 34-year-old married woman.  She deals selling cloth in her locality. She buys cloth of different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community.  She earns a good amount of profit through her business. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business.  

She is requesting a 40,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. She expects boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend a part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Shamshad

texts.en:
Shamshad, age 47, is a married woman. She deals in business of animals’ sales. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family's income. At present, she has two buffaloes and two goats.  

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more cattle. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle.

loans.name: Marjorie

texts.en:
Marjorie is 39 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Marjorie is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Marjorie has been raising pigs for two years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Naila

texts.en: Naila is a 41-year-old married woman. She has been running a school for many years with her husband (also shown in the photo). They have gained a good number of students and are respected a lot in their community. Naila, along with her husband, is contributing much to the family income through all of her great efforts. In order to accommodate more students in their academy, Naila has requested a loan of 55,000 PKR to purchase a couple of benches and chairs along with new blackboards. Naila expects more admissions as their school becomes famous in their town. She wants to spend part of the revenue on the expansion of the school.

loans.use: to purchase a couple of benches and chairs along with new blackboards.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
Doña María Isabel de 46 años de edad quien es ama de casa y agricultora junto a su esposo quien es una persona luchadora emprendedora con deseos de superarse. Está casada junto a su esposo trabajan en la siembra de café son una familia muy unida y ambos gozan de una excelente salud y ánimos de trabajar como personas humildes, amables y respetuoso trabajan diariamente para salir adelante, vivir en buenas condiciones y darles una mejor vida a sus  hijos. Ella es madre de 6 hijos estudiando únicamente uno y los otros 5 pasan en casa ya que aún no tienen edad para asistir a la escuela. Su cultivo de café está a 2 kilómetros de distancia de su casa de habitación a la cual se trasladan caminando en la montaña. Desde pequeña ha trabajado la agricultura gracias a sus padres que le enseñaron. Doña Maria Isabel solo curso en su juventud la primaria hasta tercer grado ya que por la falta de apoyo económico no pudo continuar. 
Sus sueños son  superarse como familia, darles una mejor educación a sus hijos para que ellos tengan una mejor calidad de vida en su futuro y no pasen por la misma situación que ella en su juventud. Doña Maria Isabel solicita la ayuda para la compra de abono, fertilizantes, foliares y para poder seguir cultivando más café ya en estos tiempos se necesita asistir la plantación para obtener una mejor producción.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel is 46 years old, a housewife and farmer together with her husband, who is a determined entrepreneur with the desire to overcome obstacles. She is married and together with her husband they grow coffee. They are a very close family and both enjoy excellent health and have the spirit to work as humble, kind and respectful people. They work daily to get on, live in good conditions and give a better life to their children.

She is the mother of six children, only one is at school and the other 5 stay at home as they are not old enough to go to school yet. Her coffee crop is 2 kilometers from the house where she lives, which she gets to walking through the mountains. Since she was young she has worked in farming, thanks to her parents who taught her.

Maria Isabel only studied to the third grade of primary school, but couldn't continue due to a lack of financial support. Her dreams are to do better as a family, give a better education to their children so that they can have a better quality of life in the future and don't find themselves in the same situation she did in her youth. 

Maria Isabel is asking for help to buy manure, fertilizer and liquid fertilizer to continue growing more coffee as in these times she needs to help the plantation in order to get better output.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to help with coffee cultivation.

loans.name: Najat

texts.en: Najat is a 32-year-old married woman living in a sector of Jordan called Baqaa. Her husband is retired and she has been supporting both of them by selling clothes to improve their living conditions. She started this business six months ago by selling a small amount of clothing to her friends and she then started expanding it gradually. Now, Najat needs to buy summer clothes for the coming season in order to attract more customers at the beginning of summer. However, she does not have enough money to do so and thus has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy summer clothes to sell during the coming season

loans.name: Naheed

texts.en:
Naheed is a 36-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store in her community for many years with her husband. She offers various items and goods for everyday use. She has good communication skills and has a good client list. Her husband is working as a laborer and earns insufficient income to support his family alone. She is a mother of four children. She is motivated to provide for her family. 

She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy a stock of detergents and other grocery items such as rice, grains and sugar in large quantities to meet with the increasing demand in her store. She wishes to spend part of the revenues to deal with the expenses of her children’s education and to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy a stock of detergents and other grocery items such as rice, grains and sugar in large quantities.

loans.name: Sughran

texts.en:
Sughran, age 42, is a married woman. She deals in selling goats with the support of her husband (also shown in the photo). She buys baby goats at low prices, brings them up and then her husband sells them in the market at higher prices. They make enough through her business to contribute to the family's income. 

At present she has two goats. With the support of Kashf Foundation she has gradually improved her business. Currently she is in her 6th loan cycle and applied for a loan of PKR 45,000 to purchase more baby goats. She expects boost in her earnings and wishes to spend a part of income on expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is 31 years old, a married woman and the mother of four children. The man shown in the photo is Razia’s husband who is a driver by profession who provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Razia has applied for a loan of PKR 35,000 for her husband. He wants to buy new tires and some tools for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Razia is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business. She wishes to spend a part of revenue on providing quality education for her children.

loans.use: to buy new tires and some tools for his vehicle.

loans.name: Maribeth

texts.en:
Maribeth is 28 years old, married, and has three children who are in school.

Maribeth is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy vitamin and other supplies for the livestock.

Maribeth has been raising livestock for 3 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business activities.

Maribeth would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and other supplies for the livestock

loans.name: Wangui

texts.en:
Wangui is a 40-year-old lady, married to Martin, and mother of three children. She has operated a workshop that deals with making and selling of furniture for the last three years. The business earns her a monthly income of around KES 40,000.

Wangui learnt about Vision Fund Kenya from a neighbour who is a registered member. Wangui has acquired a third loan of KES 70,000 which she will use to purchase materials for making furniture.

Wangui will use the proceeds to pay school fees for her children. Her dream is to own a residential plot.

loans.use: to purchase materials for making furniture

loans.name: Blanca Suyapa

texts.es:
Blanca es una persona de 39 años de edad, que se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su casa, se preocupa por mantener su casa con la salud e higiene  ya que lo más importante para ella son su familia. Ella vivió y se creció con su abuela quien dedicó toda su vida a realizar esta actividad su abuela era una persona muy humilde y trabajadora y fue ella quien le enseño buenos valores morales y espirituales, de esta forma poniendo en práctica todo la aprendido de su abuela ha podido salir adelante. Transcurrió el tiempo y la señora Blanca formo su hogar con su esposo, quien se dedicaba a la agricultura y son padres de 3 hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando en la escuela de su comunidad.  


Su principal fuente de ingresos depende las remesas que le envía su esposo que está trabajando en los Estados Unidos y también ella hace venta de golosinas y vende los días sábados por la tarde.


El dinero será utilizado en mejoramiento y ampliación de su casa, ya que su casa solo cuenta con dos habitaciones y ampliara dos habitaciones más para sus dos hijos, de esta manera tendrá una vivienda más completa segura  y en buenas condiciones donde vivirá y con sus hijos.


Las planes que ella tiene para un futuro son las de ampliar y mejorar su casa donde le reforzara las bases,  porque pretende a futuro construir una segunda planta y apoyara la formación y educación de sus hijos hasta que ellos sean unos profesionales graduados.  Con la ayuda de un nuevo préstamo invertirá en compra de un vehículo para hacer viajes.
texts.en:
Blanca is a 39-year-old person who works as a housewife, taking care to keep her home clean and healthy as her family is of the most importance to her. 

She lived and grew up with her grandmother who dedicated her whole life doing this kind of activity. Her grandmother was a very humble and hard-working woman and it was she who instilled in Blanca excellent moral and spiritual values. In this manner Blanca put into practice everything that she learnt from her grandmother and was able to get ahead in life. Over time, Blanca got married and her husband makes her living in farming and they are parents to three children who are studying in the community school.

Blanca's main source of income comes from the remittances sent by her husband who is working in the United States, however she also sells sweets on Saturday afternoons.

The money will be used to improve and extend her home as her house only has two rooms and she will add another two rooms for her two children. In this manner she will have a larger, more secure home that is in good conditions in which she will live with her sons.

The plans she has for the future are to extent and improve her home to reinforce the foundations because she plans to build a second floor and help with the training and education of her children so that they become professional graduates. With the help of a new loan, she will invest in the purchase of a vehicle to go on trips.

loans.use: to build two rooms for her sons.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima was born in 1982. She is a married woman living in a sector of Jordan called Wihdat. Her husband has a clothes and electrical machines store, and he is the only provider for the family. 

Now, she wants to support her husband by applying for this loan in order to buy a new collection of clothes and electrical machines for his store to raise his profit.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and electrical machines for her husbands' store.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Susan is 41 years old and has one child who is currently in school.

Susan has a furniture making business in the Philippines. Susan requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials like wood, nails, paints, etc. for her business.

Susan has been in this business for 14 years. In the future, Susan would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like wood, nails and paints for her business.

loans.name: Tereze

texts.en:
Tereze’s husband passed away as soon as he learned that their 20-year-old son was in a critical condition after he was shot accidentally as a bystander. Tereze was left to cover all the death expenses and also medical expenses all at the same time. While she was able to pay for some of these expenses, she hasn’t paid the total amount of her son’s hospital charges, and this is one of the reasons why she needs your financial help; with the rest of this loan, she will prepare the agricultural land for planting. 

Tereze is 50 years old and agriculture has been her only activity for a long time now; arboriculture is her favourite activity amongst all; plums, olives and grapes are some of the fruits she sells to the local farmers’ market. With the income Tereze generates from selling the fresh produce, she covers for all the family’s needs; apart from her son, Tereze also has a 19-year-old daughter.

loans.use: to prepare the agricultural land for planting and also pay for her son's medical bills; he was severely injured as a bystander

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more shoes, jeans and clothing material for resale.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia has successfully built her general store business in her community with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan for PKR 50,000 which she will use to buy a stock of rice, sugar, flour and packs of beverages from the market at lower rates. In this way she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy a stock of rice, sugar, flour and packs of beverages.

loans.name: Asia

texts.en:
Asia, age 31, is a married woman. She runs a boutique business to support the needs of her family members. Asia purchases cloth from the market and after doing embroidery she sews clothes and sells them to the people of her community. She is very experienced and has a good number of customers.

For the improvement of her business, Asia has taken her third loan, of 40,000 PKR. She intends to use this loan amount to buy cloth and more spools of threads in different colors, along with packs of laces, zippers, and buttons. This will allow Asia to meet the increasing demands of her customers on time. She expects a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the near future.

loans.use: to buy cloth and more spools of threads in different colors, along with packs of laces, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Emely

texts.en:
Emely is a 25-year-old married woman who works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested an 8,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Emely has borrowed and paid back two loans from NWTF before this one. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns additional income from raising pigs.

Emely aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase different kinds of electronic items like cables, light fans, plugs, radio bulbs and switches.

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en:
Shahida is 43 years old, a married woman and mother of five children. The man shown in the photo is Shahida’s son who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Shahida has applied for a loan of PKR 50,000, for her son. He wants to buy new tires and some auto spare parts. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers.  Shahida is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and some auto spare parts.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en: Amal is 42 years old and lives in a region of Jordan called Southern Ghour. Amal has been selling home products for more than three years. Now she is planning to expand her business by adding a larger quantity and greater variety of products. However, she has applied for this youth loan because she does not have enough money to do so.

loans.use: To buy more home products for her business

loans.name: Uthuman

texts.en:
Uthuman is a 28-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His business is running a retail shop. He gets additional income from phone charging, motorcycle transportation and teaching. He is facing challenges of high costs of products and the general price fluctuations. 

However, he has a vision of having a steady business fully stocked to capacity so as to attract more customers and increase his profits plus lighting his house with solar power since they don't have hydro electricity in his village. Uthuman has asked for a loan to buy solar panels for his house.

loans.use: To buy solar panels for his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase brooms, paint and paper for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, zinc, nails and door locks.

loans.name: Geradina

texts.en:
Geradina is a tea farmer in Mashonga in Bushenyi District and she is a mother of nine children. She started growing tea in the year 2000 with high hopes that she would get enough income from the business to help her sustain her big family. She is a hard-working lady who concentrates a lot on tea farming since it’s her sole source of income. 

She applied for a loan of two million shillings only for buying fertilizers to apply in the tea garden so that the soil fertility can be boosted and she can harvest much which would give her a lot of money as income after selling the harvested tea. Her clients are mainly the tea traders from around her village and the tea factories in the area which buy the green tea for processing. 

Her future hopes include making enough money in the present times so that she can be financially stable in her old age. The unpredictable weather is what challenges her most but she hopes to still make money from farming despite the challenge. She is determined to put the loan money to its proper use so that she can benefit from it and be able to pay it back without any difficulty.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his child's medical treatment.

loans.name: Dildor

texts.ru: Дилдор 41 год. Она родилась в районе Кубадиён и по ныне живет там со своей семьей. У нее муж и трое детей школьного возраста. Дилдор имеет среднее специальное образование. Она по профессии медсестра и имеет 5-летний стаж работы. Последние 8 лет Дилдор занимается растениеводством. Она на приусадебном участке земли выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры. Ей в деятельности помогают дети, так как муж находится за пределами страны на заработках. Дилдор сейчас готовится к весеннему посеву. И в связи с этим она берет кредит для купли семян, минеральных удобрений и топлива. Она надеется на поддержку.
texts.en:
Dildor is 41 years old. She was born in the Qubadiyon region and now lives there with her family. She has a husband and three children of school age. Dildor has vocational education. She is a nurse by profession and has 5 years of work experience. 

The last 8 years, Dildor has worked with field crop cultivation. She grows field crops on her personal plot of land. Her children help her with the business, as her husband is abroad as a migrant worker. 

Dildor currently prepares for the spring sowing. In connection with this she takes a loan to purchase seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel. She hopes for your support.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel in order to do the spring sowing

loans.name: Marhabo

texts.ru: Мархабо женщина-скотовод из района Носири Хусрав. Ей 41 год. Она трудолюбивая сельская женщина, заботливая жена и мать четверых детей. Ее муж работает секретарем в джамоате (джамоат - это орган местного самоуправления в сельской местности). Сама Мархабо занимается закупом, откормом и продажей скотов. Она в основном выращивает коров и бычков, как и многие жители ее села. Мархабо занимается животноводством вот уже 4 года. С куплей и продажей ей помогает муж. Так как сейчас благоприятный сезон для увеличения поголовья скота, Мархабо хочет воспользоваться этим. Она просит кредит для купли пару голов крупнорогатого скота. Таким образом Мархабо планирует расширить свой бизнес и увеличить его доходность.
texts.en:
Marhabo is a female livestock breeder from the region of Nosiri Khusrav. She is 41 years old. She is a hardworking country woman, caring wife and the mother of four children. Her husband works as a secretary for the jamoat (the jamoat is a body of local government in rural areas). Marhabo does the buying, fattening and reselling of cattle by herself. She mainly breeds cows and bulls, as many other residents in her village. 

Marhabo has worked with cattle breeding for four years already. Her husband helps her with the buying and selling. Marhabo would like to take advantage of it now being a favorable season for increasing the number of cattle. She requests a loan to purchase two heads of cattle. This way she plans to expand her business and increase her revenue.

loans.use: to purchase two heads of cattle

loans.name: Santa Rosalia Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos en el poblado de Pilcopata formaron el banco comunal “Santa Rosalia” en la provincia de Paucartambo desde hace varios años atrás y les va excelente. En este poblado no existen industrias, empresas, bancos pero existen grandes terrenos de cultivos por lo tanto la mayoría de los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, a la venta de madera, al comercio y a la ganadería.   
 
Valeriana tiene 48 años de edad y vive en el poblado de Pilcopata, ella es una madre trabajadora que saca a delante a sus hijos. A pesar de las adversidades, ella es una persona responsable y amable que sale adelante pues su actividad económica principal es la venta de comida en una pequeño restaurante que acomodo en su domicilio, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como aceite, verduras, arroz y otras cosas.

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.
texts.en:
A group of friends and neighbors from the town of Pilcopata formed the “Santa Rosalia” communal bank in the Paucartambo province a few years ago and things are going really well. There are no industries, companies, or banks in this province, but there are large farmlands and therefore most of the residents are farmers, sell lumber, are merchants, or raise livestock.

Valeriana is 48 years old and lives in Pilcopata. She is a hardworking mother who helps her three children get ahead. Despite all the adversities, she is a responsible and friendly person who is making progress in life from the sale of food in the restaurant located in her home. She needs a loan to buy ingredients such as oil, vegetables, rice etc.

The members are grateful for the opportunity for a loan and are committed to make their payments on time.

loans.use: Buy ingredients such as oil, vegetables, rice etc.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 19 years old and sells various kinds of food in his grocery store, such as cookies, candies, soft drinks, juices and macaroni. He opened the store one year ago and is requesting this youth loan to purchase shelves and a refrigerator for ice-cream. These will allow him to increase his stock, which will help him to improve the financial conditions of his family. He hopes that he continue developing his business and increasing his income.
Mohammad is very grateful to everyone who helps him to achieve success in his business with this loan.

loans.use: to buy shelves and a refrigerator for ice-cream.

loans.name: Zaynura

texts.ru: Зайнура трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 не совершеннолетних детей. Зайнура один год назад начала свой бизнес купле продажей детской одежды. Она торгует на местном рынке. Раньше она помогала своей матери продавать ее товар. Благодаря опыту она с легкостью справляется с бизнесом. Она имеет дополнительный доход. Она шьёт женские платья дома. Зайнура хочет развевать бизнес дальше. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 долларов США для покупки детской одежды для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Zaynura is a hardworking woman. She is married and raising two children. Zaynura started her business of selling children's clothing on year ago. She trades at the local market. Previously she helped her mother buy goods. Thanks to the experience, she deals with her own business with ease. She has an additional income too, she sews women's dresses at her house.

Zaynura would like to expand her business further. She requests a loan of the amount of 2,000 US dollar to purchase children's clothing for the new season. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing to sell for new season

loans.name: Amelita

texts.en:
Amelita is 44 years old and married with seven children, three of whom in school, Amelita works very hard to provide for them.

Amelita's business was devastated by super typhoon Haiyan that swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Amelita is taking out a bridge loan to restart her general store business.

Amelita has requested PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to restart  her general store business.

She is using the new loan to stock up on a variety of goods to resell. 

Amelitais committed to rebuild, and in future would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell like can goods, egg, noodles, etc

loans.name: Ernesto Ariel

texts.es: Ernesto es originario de la ciudad de Estelí, casado y padre de un hijo. Tiene 28 años de edad. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de repuestos de moto. Inicio su negocio con el apoyo de su papa que le brindo el capital inicial para empezar el negocio. Su meta próxima es comprar productos de alta rotación para ofrecerles a sus clientes. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Repuestos para motos, Cascos, Llantas y otros  productos. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá incrementar su negocio. Su plan futuro es establecer una sucursal de su negocio.
texts.en:
A native of the town of Estelí, Ernesto is married and has a son. He is 28 years old and has a business selling vehicle spare parts. He began the business with help from his father who gave him the initial start-up capital.

Ernesto's next goal is to buy parts that are much in demand to sell to his customers. He is seeking a loan to buy engine spare parts, helmets, tires and other products. The loan will be a great help to him and he will be able to expand his business. His future plan is to open a second outlet.

loans.use: Buy engine spares, helmets, tires etc.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 43 years old and has three children. She is married and has two children who are in school.

She and her family survived super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business was wiped out. 

Marilou is taking out a bridge loan to restart her general store business,  Marilou requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, toothpaste, soap, sugar, groceries, etc..

With your help, Marilouis committed to rebuild her business. In future she would like to save enough money to expand business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, toothpaste, soap, sugar, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en:
Dominga is 55 years old with one child who is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

She has a general store business in the Philippines. It was damaged by super typhoon Haiyan last November 8, 2013. Dominga requested a PHP 5000 bridge loan through NWTF to purchase stocks to sell like can goods, egg, chips, etc to restart her business activities.

Dominga has been in this business for 1 year and would like to rebuild it with your help. In the future, Dominga would like to save enough money to expand business.

loans.use: to purchase stocks to sell like can goods, egg, chips, etc

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is 45 years old and with six children, four of whom in school, Rosario works very hard to provide for them.

Rosario's business was devastated by super typhoon Haiyan that swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Rosario is taking out a bridge loan to restart her restaurant business.

Rosario has requested PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to restart her restaurant business.

She is using the new loan to stock up on a variety of goods to resell. 

Rosariois committed to rebuild, and in future would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, vegetables, spices, etc

loans.name: Emie

texts.en:
Emie is 38 years old, married and has two children. 

She and her family  survived super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business was wiped out. 

Emie is taking out a bridge loan to restart her fish vending business, Emie requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to purchase fish to sell.

She has been for 1 year now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

With your help, Emieis committed to rebuild her business. In future she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell

loans.name: Esmeralda

texts.en:
Esmeralda is a widowed woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Esmeralda is 55 years old and has three children who are in school.

She has a general store business in the Philippines. It was damaged by super typhoon Haiyan last November 8, 2013. Esmeralda requested a PHP 5000 bridge loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, toothpaste, soap, sugar, groceries, etc. to restart her business activities.

Esmeralda has been in this business for 1 year and would like to rebuild it with your help. In the future, Esmeralda would like to save enough money to expand business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, toothpaste, soap, sugar, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Nedina

texts.en:
Nedina works hard to support her family. Nedina is married and has a buy and sell frozen goods business in the Philippines. It was wiped out by super typhoon Haiyan when it swept through the Philippines on November 8, 2013.

To restart her business Nedina requested a PHP 5000 bridge loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

Nedina has been in this business for 2 years now. With your help Nedina will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, Nedina would like to save enough money to expand business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Anita is fifty-seven years old and has one child who is still in school.

Anita has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her business, such as fishing net.

Anita has been in this business for thirty-five years. In future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a fishing net for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fashionable clothing for her business

loans.name: Risolat

texts.ru: Ее зовут Рисолат. Она замужем. Рисолат с семьей живет в маленьком городке Турсунзода. Рисолат добрая и отзывчивая женщина. Она миролюбивая и очень гостеприимная. Ей 43 года. И 10 лет своей жизни она посвятила деятельности земледелия. В Таджикистане земледелия и садоводства является популярной, потому что климат и природа благоприятно способствует развитию таких деятельностей. Из покон веков таджики занимались растениеводством и животноводством, и до сих пор большая часть населения занимается сельскохозяйственными деятельностями. Родители Рисолата занимались земледелием и Рисолат тоже унаследовала эту деятельность. Началась весна и Рисолат готовиться к ежегодному посеву, у нее все готово, но ей не хватает не большой суммы, чтобы купить семена овощей. По этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Поддержите Рисолат.
texts.en: This woman's name is Risolat. She is married and lives with her family in the small city of Tursun-zoda. Risolat is a kind and sympathetic woman. She is peace-loving and hospitable. She is 43 years old, and has spent the past 10 years of her life farming. In Tajikistan farming and gardening are popular because the climate and environment are conducive to such activities. For centuries Tajiks have raised plants and animals, and today a large part of the population is still involved in agriculture. Risolat's parents farmed, and Risolat also learned this work. Spring has begun and Risolat is getting ready for annual planting. Everything is ready except that she does not have the large amount of cash needed to buy vegetable seeds. This is why she is asking for a loan. Support Risolat.

loans.use: To buy seeds for annual harvest

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more motor bikes, spare parts, motor oil and other machine spare parts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, zinc, nails and locker doors.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Nurilakan

texts.ru: Нурилакан 49 лет, вдова, после смерти супруга одна воспитывает 3 детей. У Нурилакан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Нурилакан занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 16 лет назад, с 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Нурилакан, на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 15 овец, парник расположен на территории дома, также имеется 1,0 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает арбуз, хлопок, кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 8,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нурилакан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для закупа высококачественных семян арбузов, хлопка, кукурузы для посевных работ и удобрений для обработки земли. Нурилакан намерена получить хороший урожай, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Нурилакан планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить строительство дома.
texts.en: Nurilakan is 49 years old, a widow, and has been raising three children alone since her husband's death. Nurilakan has an intermediate education, and to earn the primary income for her family she farms and raises livestock, which she began 16 years ago with 10,000 KGS. Thanks to her tireless work, Nurilakan today owns a milk cow, 15 sheep, a small barn near her house, and a 1.0 hectare plot of land where she grows watermelons, cotton, and corn each year for family use and sale. Her monthly combined income is 8,000 som (KGS). With the goal of further developing her business, Nurilakan came to Bai-Tushum bank for a loan to buy high quality watermelon, cotton, and corn seed for planting, and fertilizer for the soil. Nurilakan intends to have a good harvest, which will certainly grow the family's capital resources. She plans to invest income from the loan into expanding her livestock herd, and she also plants to save for construction of a house.

loans.use: to buy corn, melon and cotton seed, and fertilizer

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah is 43 years old and married to David. Together they are blessed with two children, who are in school.

Hannah has been farming in Ndunyu Njeru for thirteen years. She has applied for her first loan from Vision Fund Kenya to enable her buy fertilizer and pay for labor. With the anticipated profit, she plans to repay the loan and pay for school fees.

In the near future, she hopes to apply for a bigger loan from Vision Fund Kenya, in order to expand her farming business and improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Baby Chona

texts.en:
Baby Chona is fifty-five years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Baby Chona runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of PHP 29,000 through NWTF to purchase more shampoo, coffee, milk, toothpaste, sugar and soft drinks to sell. She has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items. 

Baby Chona would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more shampoo, coffee, milk, toothpaste, sugar and soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Cherry Mae

texts.en:
Cherry Mae is thirty-two years old and married with one child.

She earns a living by buying and selling livestock in the Philippines. Cherry Mae is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase additional livestock to sell.

Cherry Mae has been in this business for two years. She earns additional income by farming sugar cane. She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock to sell

loans.name: Jenny Maricela

texts.es: Jenny tiene 30 años de edad, ella vive con su esposo y tienen  3 hijos de los cuales el de 8 años y la de 6 años se encuentran asistiendo a la escuela y la de 3 años  asiste a un centro infantil mientras que sus padres se van a trabajar al jornal, Jenny juntamente con sus esposo se dedican a la agricultura y el crédito lo van a invertir comprando semilla de cebolla y arveja y también fungicidas para curar sus plantas, Jenny es una señora muy responsable que lucha para que sus hijos tengan una buena calidad de vida y sigan estudiando hasta que sean unos profesionales.
texts.en:
Jenny, age 30, lives with her husband, and they have three children.  The eight year old and the six year old go to school.  The three year old goes to a childcare center while her parents go off to do their daily work.  Jenny and her husband work in agriculture.

They will use the loan to buy onion and pea seeds.  They will also buy fungicides to make their plants healthy.

Jenny is a very responsible woman who struggles so that her children will have a good quality of life and will continue studying until they become professionals.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fungicides.

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
Chona is 45 years old and married with four children, two of whom are currently in school.

Chona works in agriculture, fattening pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Chona has been in pig fattening for 6 years now, and she has borrowed 7 prior loans from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Chona would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la elaboración de casas y otras obras, él es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Colque Orcco” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo cemento y clavos, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.

Francisco tiene 55 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo.
texts.en:
Francisco is a hard-working and enterprising person.  He gets his family ahead with his work effort.  His business activity is building houses and other works.  He is a responsible person.  That is why they invited him to participate in the “Colque Orcco” communal bank.

He now needs the loan to buy work materials like cement and nails.  He is grateful for and values the loan.  He pledges to make his monthly payments very responsibly.

Francisco is 55 years old, and he lives in the Totorani community in the Paucartambo province.

loans.use: to buy work materials like wood, cement and nails.

loans.name: Lawrence

texts.en: Lawrence used his previous loan to pay school fees for his children, but his main business is a pub. He has does farming and has a dairy business for extra income. He is facing a hardship of transporting his goods from the village to the main market. His vision is to have a fully stocked store to sell the local brew (waragi) that is in high demand. Lawrence has asked for a loan to help him rent a banana plantation and buy local brew (waragi) to sell.

loans.use: to rent a banana plantation and buy local brew (waragi) to sell.

loans.name: Shqipe

texts.en:
Shqipe (which means "eagle" in English) is a mother of two children, ages 16 and 5 years old.  

Agriculture and livestock has been been Shqipe's only source of income for years. Wholesalers and retailers buy her products from a specified location. Therefore, she does not need any transportation to take her fresh produce to the market. While her husband works with a tractor and provides services to local villagers, Shqipe plants in quantities. She raises clover and vetch for animals and also wheat. She has cherry, plum, and pear trees and a dairy cow. 

Shqipe wants to buy a seeding machine or a planter, so she is requesting this loan from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy a seeding machine or planter

loans.name: Antonina

texts.en:
Antonina is 58 years old, married with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Antonina has a fishing business in the Philippines. Antonina requested a PHP 8000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Antonina has been in this business for two years. In the future, Antonina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is 25 years old; she lives in a small house with her husband.

For the past three years, she has run a food market in a rented space, but she hopes in the future to buy a grocery. This business has helped the family income, because her husband works in a public institution that offers a low salary. It is helpful especially because they are a big family and need to ensure their kids' well-being.

Iman sells different kinds of foodstuffs, like soft drinks, cookies and other things. She asked Ryada for this youth loan to buy shelves and a refrigerator.
 
Iman is very grateful to everyone who helps her, and the one who appears in the photo is her husband: for cultural reasons she can’t publish her photos online, so she apologizes.

loans.use: to buy shelves and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Ruzanna

texts.en:
Ruzanna lives in Ayntap village in the Ararat region. She lives with her husband, 26-year-old son and 21-year-old daughter. 

Ruzanna and her family own a plot of land where they cultivate potatoes. They also keep a cow and 2 calves, but they aren’t able to enlarge the number of livestock because the barn is too old and needs to be renovated. That’s the reason Ruzanna has applied for this loan. 

She asks USD 1000 to be able to renovate their old barn, which is located near their house. This will give her an opportunity to enlarge her agribusiness and she will be very grateful to all lenders.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of the barn

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more soft drinks, pure water, butter, soap and cigarettes.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is 49 years old, married with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Corazon has a fishing business in the Philippines. Corazon requested a PHP 8000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Corazon has been in this business for 2 years.  In the future, Corazon would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Гулноре 32 года, замужем и на воспитании имеет 2  детей. Она очень трудолюбивый человек и имеет более чем 10 лет опыта в бизнесе. Она занимается куплей продажей фруктов на местном рынке. В последнее время у нее мало клиентов, так как конкуренция большая. Она должна срочно расширить свой ассортимент для того, чтобы вернуть своих клиентов. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  5000 сомони для того, чтобы купить яблоко, ананас, банан, груши и т.п. Она надеется на вас и на вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulnora is 32 years old, married, and has two children. She is a very hardworking person and has more than 10 years of experience in business. She sells fruit at the local market. Recently she has not had many clients, since there is a lot of competition. She needs to quickly expand her assortment of goods to win back her customers. She is asking for a loan of 5000 somoni to buy apples, pineapples, bananas, pears, etc. She hopes for your kindness and support.

loans.use: To buy apples, pineapples, bananas, pears etc. to widen her assortment of goods

loans.name: Danny Hugo

texts.es:
Danny Hugo tiene ,45 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Lagunas una comunidad tranquila, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposa se dedica a la crianza de animales menores gallinas, pollos y patos en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecer una mejor producción a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Danny Hugo is 45 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the district of Lagunas, a peaceful community. It's residents work in agriculture, trade and livestock. It is located an hour from the city of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque, on the northern coast of Peru.

Together with his wife he works raising small animals, such as chickens and ducks, behind his house. He has asked for a loan of 500 nuevos soles to buy balanced feed to fatten up his animals and in this way have better production for his customers.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to fatten up his animals.

loans.name: Pedro Sixto

texts.es:
Pedro Sixto tiene 64 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público en su propia mototaxi, trasladando a sus pasajeros a loas caseríos aledaños a s u distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 300 nuevos soles para la compra de una mototaxi de segunda y de esta manera comprarla para seguir brindando el servicio de transporte público.
texts.en:
Pedro Sixto is 64 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the district of Cayalti, a community dedicated to agriculture, trade and livestock. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Peru. 

He offers public transportation service in his own motorcycle taxi, transporting his passengers to the nearby communities in his district. He has asked for a loan of 1,300 nuevos soles to buy a second hand motorcycle taxi and in this way continue to offer the public transportation service.

loans.use: to buy a second hand motorcycle to offer public transportation service.

loans.name: Gulbarchin

texts.ru: Гульбарчын 35 лет, замужем. У Гульбарчын - средне-специальноее образование, в данное время работает медсестрой в местной больнице. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Гульбарчын занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 12 лет назад, с 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гульбарчын, на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 лошади, 20 овец, также имеется земельная доля, на которой ежегодно выращивает арбузы, хлопок, кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гульбарчын обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для закупа высококачественных семян арбузов, хлопка, кукурузы для посевных работ и удобрений для обработки земли. Гульбарчын намерена получить хороший урожай, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Гульбарчын планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Gulbarchin is 35 years old and married. She has a vocational education and currently works as a nurse at the local hospital. To earn additional income for her family Gulbarchin also farms and raises livestock, which she began 12 years ago with 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her tireless work, she now owns four horses, twenty sheep, and a plot of land where she grows watermelon, cotton, and corn each summer for family use and sale. Her monthly aggregate income is 10,000 (KGS). With the goal of further developing her business, Gulbarchin came to the Bai Tushum bank for a loan to buy high quality watermelon, cotton, and corn seed for planting, and fertilizer for soil development. Gulbarchin expects to have a good harvest, which will increase the family's capital. She plans to invest earnings from use of the loan into expanding her livestock herd, and also plans to save for home renovations.

loans.use: to buy corn, melon and cotton seed and fertilizer

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en:
Jonalyn is 23 years old and married. She has one child who is in school.

Jonalyn is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Jonalyn requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase vitamins and vaccines for her livestock.

Jonalyn has been raising livestock for 4 years now and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Jonalyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins and vaccines for her livestock.

loans.name: Ma. Neobi

texts.en:
Ma. Neobi is 24 years old, married with four children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Ma. Neobi has a food vending business in the Philippines. Ma. Neobi requested a PHP 13000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Ma. Neobi has been in this business for four years. In the future, Ma. Neobi would like to save enough money in order to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Luis Armando

texts.es:
Luis Armando tiene 27 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijo en el distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad que se caracteriza por grandes depósitos de piedra y arena que la población utiliza para la construcción de viviendas, también se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores pavos, gallinas, cuyes, cerdos, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecerlos a un mejor precio.
texts.en:
Luis Armando is 27 years old and he lives with his wife and child in the district of Cayalti, a community characterized by its large reservoirs of wood and sand that the residents use to build their homes. They also work in agriculture, trade and livestock. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

He works raising and selling small animals such as turkeys, chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs. His business is located in the back of his house. He has asked for a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles to buy balanced feed to fatten up his animals and in this way offer them at a better price.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to fatten up his animals.

loans.name: Areej

texts.en:
Areej is a 21-year-old married lady from Jenin city. She lives with her husband in a small, simple house. Areej's husband is a worker with a low and unstable income. This is the only source of income for the family. Areej is a student in a local university where she studies business administration. She would like to earn the BA degree and find a good job in the future.

Areej took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new laptop for her studies. By taking this loan, Areej will be able to do her homework and write the reports easily. 

Areej is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her father appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her studies.

loans.name: Ma. Ligaya

texts.en:
Ma. Ligaya works hard to support her family. Ma. Ligaya is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years now.

Ma. Ligaya requested a 25,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her fishing business.

Ma. Ligaya would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for her fishing business

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Riza works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store. Riza is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Riza has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.
